abilities.name: Defiance
abilities.description: Fire a burst of 3 rounds from your revolver, with reduced accuracy

abilities.name: Accursed Arm
abilities.description: Androxus freezes wherever he is (doesn't fall if airborne), mutates his arm into a massive gun and fires 4 explosive blasts. He has air control

abilities.name: Reversal
abilities.description: For 2s, Androxus absorbs the power of all shots fired at him from the front. After 2s, fire all power back in the direction you facing

abilities.name: Nether Step
abilities.description: Androxus quickly surges forward, and may do so once more before the cooldown is incurred
